Album Notes
Liner Note Author: David Nathan.Photographer: Olivier Henry.The lone single-disc spin-off from Time Life's 11-disc Sweet Soul of the `70s box set, Reunited plucks 13 duets and collaborations. Peaches & Herb's "Reunited," Billy Davis, Jr. and Marilyn McCoo's "You Don't Have to Be a Star (To Be in My Show)," Earth, Wind & Fire's "Boogie Wonderland" (featuring the Emotions), Johnny Mathis and Deniece Williams' "You're All I Need to Get By," and Marvin Gaye and Diana Ross' "You're a Special Part of Me" are among the selections. This is the least essential volume of the series, but it does include several classics that any casual soul fan should be happy to own. ~ Andy Kellman
